name: Is It A Word?
description: A game based on guessing whether a word is or is not real. An AI has generated thousands of fake words, and you will either be given an AI-generated word or a real English word. Your job is to figure out which. There are three different gamemodes, one is a "free play" mode in which you play infinitely and are given a percentage score as you go along. One is "Time" mode, in which you have 30 seconds to get as many correct as you can, and a "20 questions" mode, in which you must answer 20 questions and are given a percentage score from that. Change your gamemode by pressing space.
